content.rendered:
CONTACT US

  • Home

FOR CORPORATE PARTNERSHIPS

Parul Sharma – 9266740073
cp@smilefoundationindia.org

Donation Related Queries

FOR NEW DONORS

Aakanksha Wahi – 7042128777

donation@smilefoundationindia.org

FOR EXISTING DONORS

Parul Kapoor – 8882517003

donorcare@smilefoundationindia.org

FOR ALL GENERAL QUERIES

info@smilefoundationindia.org

Helpdesk

For any grievance, suggestions and queries kindly write to us.

PARTNERSHIP SUPPORT

Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Related Queries

NORTH REGION

Vikram Singh Walia – 8130145658

cp.del@smilefoundationindia.org

WEST REGION

John Thattil – 9820363999

cp.mum@smilefoundationindia.org

SOUTH REGION

Archana Kore – 9880602956

cp.blr@smilefoundationindia.org

EAST REGION

Joieta Rajput- +91 98997 10672

CORPORATE EMPLOYEE ENGAGEMENT 

Salony Pandya – 9999180854

engagement@smilefoundationindia.org

CAUSE MARKETING & CAMPAIGNS 

Roopam Dhir – 8178468746

crm@smilefoundationindia.org

OTHER PARTNERSHIPS

EVENT RELATED QUERIES

Rajeev Sharma – 9818282854

events@smilefoundationindia.org

FOR MEDIA-RELATED QUERIES

Write to Sandip Nayak at

sandip@smilefoundation.email

CELEBRITY ASSOCIATIONS

Puneet Singh – 9819770599

sm@smilefoundationindia.org

SCHOOL PARTNERSHIP

Meena Batra

info.cfc@smilefoundation.email

COMMUNICATION RELATED ASSOCIATIONS

MEDIA QUERIES

Write to Sandip Nayak at
sandip@smilefoundation.email

CONTENT WRITERS, GRAPHIC DESIGNERS & CREATIVE AGENCIES

Write to Akanksha Rawat at
akanksha@smilefoundation.email

PHOTOGRAPHERS, VIDEOGRAPHERS & FILMMAKERS

Write to Ritika Gupta at
ritika.gupta@smilefoundation.email

WEBSITE & SOCIAL MEDIA

Write to Ritika Gupta at
ritika.gupta@smilefoundation.email

PROGRAMME RELATED QUERIES

NGO PARTNERSHIPS

Write to Samuel at
ngo.partnership@smilefoundationindia.org

Education

Write to Gargi
at me@smilefoundationindia.org

HEALTHCARE

Write to Satnam at
health@smilefoundationindia.org

CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT ON LOCAL FUNDRAISING & MOBILISING SUPPORT TOWARDS SUSTAINABILITY

Write to
ctg-india@smilefoundationindia.org

Livelihood

Write to Bipasha at
step@smilefoundationindia.org

COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT

Write to Seema at
swabhiman@smilefoundationindia.org

Volunteering & Jobs

CAREER OPPORTUNITIES

Write to HR at
jobs@smilefoundationindia.org

INTERNSHIP OPPORTUNITIES

Write to us at
intern@smilefoundationindia.org

VOLUNTEERING OPPORTUNITIES

Write to us at
volunteer@smilefoundationindia.org

VISIT US HERE

HEAD OFFICE

161 B/4, 3rd Floor, Gulmohar House, Yusuf Sarai Community Centre, New Delhi – 110049
Phone: +91-11-43123700, +91-11-41354564/65/66 l Fax: +91-11-41354454
Email: info@smilefoundationindia.org

Regd. Office:
V-11, Level 1, Green Park Extension, New Delhi – 110016

REGIONAL OFFICES

MUMBAI
Kolkata
Bengaluru
MUMBAI

Address

101, First Floor Gladdiola Above Kotak Bank, Hanuman Road, Ville Parle East, Mumbai - 400 057

Phone

91-22-26104106/07


Email

mumbai@smilefoundationindia.org


Kolkata

Address

Hirise Dew, 1st Floor, 55 Charu Chandra Place (East), Near Lokenath Sweets, Kolkata - 33

Phone

033-24227084


Email

kolkata@smilefoundationindia.org


Bengaluru

Address

NO.14, Buddha Vihar Road, Sinnou Elegance Apartment, Flat No.103, Frazer Town, Bengaluru - 560005

Phone

080-41320797


Email

bangalore@smilefoundationindia.org
